Articles.Content:
Welcome, one and all, to Crash & Splode Aerodynamics founded by Crash Kerman and Splode Kerman.

This corporation is dedicating to protecting the KSC and it's inhabitants at all costs. Equipped with the latest aeronautic technology, we have the best to offer in your quest to defend Kerbin!

Mods Needed:

Bd Armoury

Mk2 Expansion 

Mk3 Expansion

AirplanePlus

SXT Props and Planes

 

Edited June 12, 2016 by TheSealBrigade

A new craft has appeared!

The Crash & Splode R-1 was the first fighter aircraft ever built. With the help Reginald Kerman, Crash Kerman was finally able to figure out how to make the spinny thing work. The ‘Warpig’ is a very nimble warplane, with the ability to turn on about 5 dimes. Armed with 4 50. cal machine guns and plenty of ammo gives it quite a punch. It’s only weakness was the utter lack of yaw control. Let’s hope Reginald doesn’t screw that up next time...

DOWNLOAD

 

And another one!

The Crash & Splode R-2 was not the most effective warplane made by anyone. Splode claims this is Reginald’s fault; the engineer behind the R series. He was fired and the public was notified this would never happen again. The R-2 ‘Python’ is slow, and a bit clunky, but it makes up this weakness with 6 50 cal. machine guns. If you can get behind your target, you are almost guaranteed a victory.

DOWNLOAD

One last one!

The Crash & Splode V-1 is the first of the V series, and the last prop plane to be produced by C&S. Designed to give trucks and tanks a hard time, the V-1 'Spetmatooie' is armed with a 30mm chain gun, and a single 'Snake-eye' bomb. Valence Kerman is not the best at names, but his engineering prowess greatly exceeds Reginald's. The V-1 is very maneuverable and quick to accelerate, making it hard to hit with guns. But It's small frame and delicate structure may be a pilots' downfall. Literally. 

DOWNLOAD

Edited June 8, 2016 by TheSealBrigade
Here are some screenshots from a battle:  6 C&S R-1 Warpigs vs. A Battleship
